nodes.text: The Elite Selonian Guard was a group of Selonian warriors who served as the elite bodyguard of the den leader Murthil. By 3640 BBY, Destha was a member of the Guard, and she and a handful of other Selonian Guards accompanied Murthil in the latter's bunker at the time of the Sith-Imperial strike force's arrival there. The two sides battled, and the Guard members were all killed by an Imperial hero who proceeded to dispatch of Murthil, thus ending her den's efforts to resist Imperial rule.

In cutscenes of Star Wars: The Old Republic, three Elite Selonian Guards could be seen alongside Destha and Murthil. However, in the game environment itself, only two members of the Elite Selonian Guard existed alongside Destha and Murthil.
